title: AWS S3 Static Website Hosting
summary: Hosted a static site and fixed common permission and routing issues.
impact: Resolved 403 AccessDenied by correcting bucket policy and public access settings.
Built a clean /assets structure (css/js/images) with stable relative paths.
Configured website endpoints and error page behavior.

title: osTicket Helpdesk Lab
summary: Simulated service desk workflows and documented ticket resolution steps.
impact: Created agents, users, SLAs, and ticket categories to match real helpdesk ops.
Documented troubleshooting steps for repeatable resolutions.

title: Azure Identity Fundamentals Lab
summary: Practiced identity basics with structured users/groups and access concepts.
impact: Organized users/groups with naming standards and clean documentation.
Practiced access control concepts and basic identity flows.
Captured screenshots and created a README-style walkthrough.
